shef.mt.xmlwrap
Class MOSES_XMLWrapper

java.lang.Object
  shef.mt.xmlwrap.MOSES_XMLWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLWrapper
public class MOSES_XMLWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLWrapper

This class produces an XML file from the output of the MOSES machine translation system It also produces a series of text files from the nbest list (one file per sentence), which will be used in computing the glass box features that rely on ngrams computed on the nbest list
